trans-unit.source: A trigger action that advances a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to the end of its fill period.
trans-unit.target: En utlösaråtgärd avancerar en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> till slutet av dess slutperiod.

trans-unit.source: Use a SkipStoryboardToFill action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to advance a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to its fill period, if it has one.
trans-unit.target: Använda en SkipStoryboardToFill-åtgärd med ett <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>eller en <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>att avancera en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>till dess slutperiod, om det finns någon.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: This action also advances all child <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objects of the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to their fill periods, if they have them.
trans-unit.target: Den här åtgärden även avancerar alla underordnade <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>objekt i målet <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>till sina fill perioder, om de har dem.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: SkipStoryboardToFill only affects an active <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: SkipStoryboardToFill påverkar endast en aktiv <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>(när den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>startar).</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pausa, återuppta, stopp eller annars kontroll en Storyboard interaktivt ska kunna pausa, återuppta eller på annat sätt styra en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interaktivt, ange den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>egenskapen för dess <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>och använda en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objekt (t.ex <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) ta kontroll över den genom att referera till dess <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>inte anges, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>inte kan styras interaktivt när den har startat.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [så här: styra en Storyboard när den startar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) för mer information.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"> </xref> klass.
